entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
